name: User Generator
description:
User Generator

Insert awesome random User images into your design prototypes. Support English and 中文简体 according to your OS language.


How to use:


1. Select shape(s);

2. Run the plugin.

3. Select region and gender.

4. Just confirm.


According to your filter, it will fetch an random user image(s) and add it(them) as a fill on your selected element(s).


The plugin supports up to 10 selections at a time


Images are aggregated by unsplash.com and other sources.


------------------------------------------------------------

头像助手


根据用户选择形状，自动在设计稿中部署头像。支持英语，汉语界面，根据操作系统语言自动切换。


使用说明：

1.选择形状；

2.运行插件；

3.选择区域和性别

4.点击确认


根据用户选择过滤条件，随机获取头像进行部署在所选元素上。

单次最多可同时选择10个形状。

头像素材从unsplash.com和其他资源处获取。
